about.title: ABOUT
about.subtitle: Let me introduce myself!
about.text1: My name is Esteban, I'm 22 years old, and I'm currently studying computer science and engineering. I'm a student at ECE Lyon-Paris, an engineering school that has been around for over 100 years!
about.text2: I'm passionate about new technologies, and I'm always happy to learn something new! Alongside my courses, I've started multiplying professional experiences to discover more about the world of engineering.
about.text3: I'm very motivated to develop my current skills and acquire new ones by working on an exciting project with you!
